title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: The popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon release.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Observed: There is no popup menu displayed to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear, allowing users to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear, enabling users to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
